amendment.description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to increase and decrease funding for grants to the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority to emphasize the importance of restoring public safety on the DC Metro.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
